reviews.review_text: Our strata contracted NLD for completion of our 2023 depreciation report. Terrys inspection of the property was detailed and thorough. It was obvious during our walk around the building that he was knowledgeable and very qualified. The report itself is also thorough and detailed with an easy to read executive summary (helpful as the document is 129 pages long). They made clear recommendations for property improvements along with a variety of reserve funding options. We will definitely use them for future depreciation reports. Thanks NLD
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Robert. Thank you for your kind words; we are always pleased when a strata corporation benefits from the depreciation report process and the guidance on reserve funding options. All the Best! NLD.

reviews.review_text: Michael LaPorte our Strata advisor for our depreciation report was second to none.  His patience and expertise made an arduous task  seem  more achievable.  The report appeared to take forever to be completed (Mar 2022 - Jan 2023) but through no fault of Michaels. We are a self managing complex so many questions needed to be addressed through adapting new bylaws which directly affected the depreciation report.  Michael was with us every step of the way to answer questions or direct us to the proper authority to get interpretation. He always answered emails promptly and shed light on any concerns we might have had. Michael presented a zoom meeting to our unit owners to clarify the depreciation report and answer questions  which greatly simplified councils position. So without hesitation we can recommend NLD Consulting as a firm that truly does care about their client.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Wow - Thank You for the kind review. Guiding a self-managed strata council and owners through the process is actually one of the rewarding aspects of preparing the depreciation report. We are very happy that the process (although it took a while!) worked out well for your strata, and we hope the report provides an achievable path for healthy crf funding for years to come. Cheers. NLD.

reviews.review_text: We at the Red Robs Condos in Rossland contracted NLD Consulting to develop our 2022 Depreciation Report. They were extremely professional and responsive, and the report was extensive and highly detailed, including multiple funding options and analysis levels. We would highly recommend NLD Consulting!
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thank you so much Mike. It was a pleasure working with your strata to prepare your depreciation report. All the best. Mike.

reviews.review_text: Mike LaPorte of NLD Consulting provided Council and owners of our bare land strata excellent service and professional advice to produce a practical Insurance Appraisal and Depreciation Report in a timely manner. Mike has excellent presentation skills and made complex information understandable. We highly recommend NLD Consulting.

Mike LaPorte has been professional, thorough and patient during the whole Depreciation Report process, and has involved our strata council at each step to establish a manageable plan for future project financing. We considered many companies, including engineering firms, seeking references from others in the industry, before selecting NLD. We would highly recommend NLD for Depreciation Report projects.
Quick, professional , easy to work with, and provides great expert reports/advices
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Hi Amynta - thank you for the kind words for our NLD Team!

reviews.review_text: Great to work with, highly recommended.
reviews.response_from_owner_text: Thanks for the Shout Out Kevin! Great to hear the positive feedback!

reviews.review_text: Thank you, Mike. It is always nice to deal with someone who truly knows their business. I will be in touch down the road for an update.
